Title: Code Socially
Description:
Code Socially is a website for noobs who just learned programming (.NET, Android, Ruby, IPhone Dev, etc) and have ideas to build a web app/project. A website where everyone can learn from each other socially. 
Developed using ASP.NET MVC, Silverlight, JQuery, Blend, C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Code Socially is a website for those people who wants to learn programming in a more social way in various platform (.NET, Android, Ruby, IPhone Dev, etc).The concept of learning and helping each other and put it into a project to build something is very unique and which triggers people to learn more and more.

This website will facilitate everyone to have a supporting environment to learn from each other and build small projects which will be composed to be a learning tutorial. Each member can generate a webcast series, create a gantt chart for their project, find people with similar backgrounds and interest to develop for a project. Everything is so much fun if it's social, and so does coding socially.

Developed using ASP.NET MVC, Silverlight, JQuery, Blend, C#.
